alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cameron; Coastal Willacy; Inland Cameron; Southern Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued February 04 at 10:03PM CST until February 05 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 expected. * WHERE...Cameron, Southern Hidalgo, and Coastal Willacy Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Cameron; Coastal Willacy; Inland Cameron; Southern Hidalgo
